meta.description: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Non-Schengen) at Frankfurt Airport (FRA), Terminal 1, Concourse Z. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Non-Schengen)

location.terminalDirections: Level 4, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.

lounge.description: Lufthansa's Business Lounges offer a variety of snacks and beverages along with comfortable seating to relax or take care of business before your flight.

warning: This location does not accept passengers in airline uniforms.

reviews.content: Very helpful staff. Plenty of little hideaways to rest in.
Quite crowded but you get a seat. The food was delicious and the service was great. Good place to eat and relax before your international departure. It was clean.
I arrived around 0630 hrs. At that time it wasn't too crowded. At 0830 is when the crowd picks up. Didn't like that the chairs aren't plug friendly for US chargers, had to go to business area.
Solid lounge. Showers are nice, kept clean, and agents for both United and Lufthansa at hand.
I might have visited during a slow time, but it was good timing then. Very clean, very large, and lots of good food.
A bit crazy with crying kids. Good coffee and tea selections. Cold cuts, cheese, bread, scrambled eggs for breakfast. Also fruits and yogurts. Bathrooms could use some cleanings.
Nice lounge, large with snack type foods, not many hot meals. German beers on tap. Crowded at about noon but empty by 2 pm.
Large lounge, with a lot of seating of different types. Clean and not crowded. Drinks are ok but food choice is poor (at 5pm).
This is an ok lounge, I have a 7 hour layover. The tables with plugs are the high stools with no backs so not very comfortable for working.
Excellent wi-fi, spacious. Limited food and beverages. Bright, clean. Very nice place to get some work done, relax and wait out stopover.
Spacious and LH comfy. Lots of power ports, some decent cold and hot food, ample drinks. There are nap areas and shower rooms are very good. Nice views of planes at gates.
Definitely worth swinging by if you have the time. They have plenty of space to work or relax including lay flat beds. Food and beer selection is slightly weak.
Great food and beverage selection. Nice phone recharging station. Even though it felt slightly crowded there were still plenty of open seats.
Nice roomie lounge with excellent wifi and many various seating types. Food selection a touch limited but full drink selection.
Nice lounge, offers everything you would expect from it. Only the variety of available food is very limited.
Great with multiple seating choices including recliners. Roomy.
Spacious-above average. Plenty of outlets (many with British & American plugs).
Great shower facilities, nice food and drink selection.
For anyone used to clubs in the USA, this lounge is super. Otherwise, it is a standard issue LH lounge w/ alc+nonalc drinks and a spread of hearty food. Also, expansive windows w/ view of the tarmac.
Excellent large lounge that's not as crowded as others at FRA...food selection a bit lacking, though!
This is a great lounge that offers plenty of room for you to stretch out in.
Service is lackluster but food, beverage and ambiance is excellent. Roomy with separate areas for work, relax, etc. Work area has multiple outlet types so most plug types fit w/o adapter.
This is a great lounge with clean showers and adequate food. The WiFi worked fine for me too.

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate A13, Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop.
Near Gate A26, proceed one level up to the entrance.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, next to Gate A13.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, towards Gate A50.
Located behind Airport Entrance 13 (Tor 13) when arriving by car.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B24-B28 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B44-B48 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
Departure Area B, next to Gate B22.
Departure Area B, opposite Gate B42, next to Gate B43.
Outside of Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, Arrival Area B, immediately behind the Baggage Claim.
Landside, between Concourses B and C on the Gallery Level, next to the Travel Market (Reisemarkt).
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gates C14-C15.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gate C14 and Gate C15.
Level 3, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
